content.stimulus_en: She (not/have to) ________ cook tonight.
We (must not) ________ touch the art.
You (must not) ________ smoke here.
It's free, you (not/have to) ________ pay.
You (not/have to) ________ hurry.
They (must not) ________ be late.
You don't have to come to the meeting if you are busy.
She have doesn't to wear a suit to the office.
We mustn't forget to lock the door.
Children play mustn't near the busy road.
It's a holiday, so we don't have to go to school.
You park mustn't your car in front of the entrance.
